item.title: Rep-ing people help
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

Why not just ignore the karma system all together, lets not make this topic that was a simple quick answer thread turn into a full blown topic on rep.

Read full topic

item.title: Rep-ing people help
item.dc:creator: @Fall_Out_Boy Fall Out Boy
item.description:
@Fall_Out_Boy wrote:

[quote=“Tico135, post:5, topic:102033”][quote author=Fr33sc4p3 link=topic=146244.msg1393191#msg1393191 date=1180420344]
Just ignore rep altogether it is means nothing, focus on programming and i promise you will be respected over alot of people in this community, admin’s mod’s g mods will respect you allot more if you ignore rep, focus on programming and things like that, so if you want to make a name for youself in this community, rep is not the way.
[/quote]

Listen to Fr33. He knows exactly what he is taking about and is correct. Thanks for that Fr33.[/quote]

Okay, that was a waste of topic space. Your posting a reply saying I agree, which is against the rules. And if the admins don’t like it soo much, why don’t they just disable the Karma system all together?

Read full topic
